If you want a classic FPS shooter experience this is a solid choice. Half-life 2 is a fun shooter/puzzle game that will keep you going for about 17 hours of mayhem in a dystopian future with brain eating monsters from another dimension. It has aged pretty well and Half-life Alyx is the mad bomb note. Get some!

This is a timeless piece of gaming. Its hands down one of the best FPS titles of all time and the physics engine is second to none to this very day. If you`ve never played it ... treat yourself! However its best purchased in the Orange box bundle to get the FULL value of the title. If you buy it alone ... then enjoy it (as I am sure you will) you will just want more ... and paying for all the titles you would get outright in the bundle is just not good for the old pocketbook.

Almost perfect.
I played it several times when I was a teenager. Now after all these years it is still one of the best games ever!

Good crazy story, deep atmosphere (great unique soundtrack, sounddesign, grafikstyle) and massive leveldesign.

The one annoying thing is that you can't bind weapons to a key, only groups.

это шедевр, ни больше, ни меньше

Valve'ın büyük bir gelişme kaydettiği İkincil bir Devrim Oyunu, Half - Life 2. Oyundaki özgürlükler Half - Life 1'den daha fazla olduğu için biraz daha komik ve biraz daha eğlenceli bir oyun. Gerek fizik olsun, gerek animasyonlar ve gerek grafikler olsun, Half - Life 2 gerçekten İkincil bir Baş Yapıt. Grafik Optimizasyonu da gerçekten çok iyi. Almayı düşünüyorsanız, hiç tereddüt etmeden alınız, derim.
Kesinlikle tavsiye ederim çünkü harika aksiyonu ve gerilimi çok güzel bir şekilde ayarladığı için tadından yenmez bir oyun bu.
My favorite fps and one of my favorite games of all time. It's incredible!
Игра говно,я и 5 минуть наиграть не могу
在那个电脑配置不高，玩电脑时间被严格管控的童年，第一次打开了半条命。从黑山到17号城市，感谢这些年半条命带给我的感动。期待再次拿起撬棍，踏上北极光之路。

Phenomenal. Never played until 2020. There is a reason this is one of the greatest video games of all time. Took me forever to get to it but it was worth the wait! Amazing flow between scenes and battlefields and keeps the player hooked all day long. THIS GAME IS A MUST PLAY FOR ANYONE WHO LIKES VIDEO GAMES. The driving sequences are fun and the story is super imaginative. I cannot say enough to praise this game.
One of the best Valve games i've seen! Despite being a tiny bit old it still holds up very well compared to other games.

O retorno de Gordon nesse jogo é muito eletrizante, pois o game tem muito mais ação que antes e os vilões começam a aparecer de verdade. Mesmo com umas partes bem difíceis, o game tem um ritmo de shooter e perde alguns momentos em que você se assustava como acontecia no Half Life 1.
Es una obra maestra que cambió la industria de los juegos para siempre. Casi -casi- obligatorio jugarlo, por más que sea viejo. No creo que haya una tercera parte :( xdxd
Categoric este jocul care îl rejoc a treia oară și care pare mi se că nu l-am jucat niciodată. Aceea atmosfera ruptă dintr-un film socialist îmi straneste cel mai tare starea de nostalgie.

more like Half of my life lol

One of the best games I've ever played in regards to story telling and atmospheric immersion. Half-Life 2 has very enjoyable gameplay typical to a first-person shooter, but with puzzles mixed in between the high energy combat. I won't say that this game has revolutionary game mechanics, but they are very well polished, mixed, and the story is something you have to engage with as well to get the full package of the game.
A 16 year old game, that holds up better than most if not all games today.
